ygData.subject: Re: Possiable making of a Paladin FAQ, will need  help though :)
ygData.msgSnippet: We ll need a place to post or send submissions.  One idea is a message board.  I have one that was free if no one else has a better one.  It s been a while
ygData.messageBody:
We'll need a place to post or send submissions. One idea is a message
board. I have one that was free if no one else has a better one. It's
been a while since I was in there and have to look at notes to get
back...

Anyway, something like that with a good thread structure even better or
I could make a simple form on my web site for people to submit stuff
(will go into an Access database so I could categorize what type of
suggestion/info it is) with drop downs for what the category/info is and
text fields for the info? I use active server pages on my web site so
it would be easy to continuously show the newest info as the pages build
themselves every time someone hits it.

lemme know on the web idea and I can do that,
Shawn

-----Original Message-----
From: Thang Tran [mailto:tdt7@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 7:12 AM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Possiable making of a Paladin FAQ, will need
help though :)


From: "Thang Tran" <tdt7@...>

This Sounds like an awesome idea. But how are we going to pool all of
the info into a FAQ? Well, if we decide to do it I'll do what I can to
help
Elthain of Felwithe
Paladin of Tunare
Mithaniel Marr


>From: <cybrwzrd@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqpaladin] Possiable making of a Paladin FAQ, will need
help though :)
>Date: Tue, 20 Apr 1999 00:53:23 -0500
>
>I have an idea, we can all pool out thoughts and expierences together
to form a Paladin FAQ to help the Newcomers and even the veterans of
our Exhalted class. It could include Quest discriptions, weaponry
reccommendations, Lvl guide to what you should be fighting, etc. This
is just a thoughtfrom a late night E-mail reading session, and The #'s
of brothers and sisters in the list keeps rising, so feel free to ask
away or just share stories, or even the occasional rant about an
annoying Shadowknight or Necro :P
>
>
>Laurana Highwind
>High Elf Paladin
>15th rank Knight of Tunare
>The Rathe
>List Mediator
>
>
